title: RAK10701-P Field Tester for LoRaWAN Pro Datasheet > RAK10701-P Field Tester for LoRaWAN Pro Datasheet > Overview > Description > RAK10701-P Field Tester for LoRaWAN Overview
content: The **RAK10701-P Field Tester for LoRaWAN** is a ready-to-use WisNode for evaluating deployed LoRaWAN network, which comes in a hard case and two different antenna types. It has a GNSS and a touchscreen LCD for the user interface, which displays the number of gateways the device can reach and other parameters like approximate distance, RSSI, and SNR. It is powered by a rechargeable battery and can be charged via USB Type-C interface.
parent_content:
The **RAK10701-P Field Tester for LoRaWAN** is a ready-to-use WisNode for evaluating deployed LoRaWAN network, which comes in a hard case and two different antenna types. It has a GNSS and a touchscreen LCD for the user interface, which displays the number of gateways the device can reach and other parameters like approximate distance, RSSI, and SNR. It is powered by a rechargeable battery and can be charged via USB Type-C interface.  
> **WARNING:** The latest RAK10701 Field Tester firmware only works on the following LoRaWAN Network Servers: **Helium**, **The Things Network**, and **Chirpstack**.  
> **TIP:** NOTE
The [source code of RAK10701](https://github.com/RAKWireless/RAK10701-Field-Tester) is open-sourced (except the RUI3 APIs).  
The device has to be charged first if it comes fresh from shipping. There is a possibility that the battery was drained during its transport.

title: RAK10701-P Field Tester for LoRaWAN Pro Datasheet > RAK10701-P Field Tester for LoRaWAN Pro Datasheet > Specifications > Hardware > Interfaces > RAK10701-P Field Tester Interfaces Overview
content: The RAK10701-P Field Tester for LoRaWAN has four interfaces which are the touch screen LCD, external button, antenna port, and USB connector.
parent_content: The RAK10701-P Field Tester for LoRaWAN has four interfaces which are the touch screen LCD, external button, antenna port, and USB connector.

title: RAK10701-P Field Tester for LoRaWAN Pro Datasheet > RAK10701-P Field Tester for LoRaWAN Pro Datasheet > Specifications > Hardware > Interfaces > Touchscreen TFT LCD > RAK10701-P Touchscreen LCD Interface Overview
content:
The touchscreen LCD is the main interface of the device. Most of the user interaction is done via the touchscreen LCD.  
> **Image:** RAK10701-L front view with an LCD screen  
You can interact with the device and check the data needed on your LoRaWAN network field testing. The icons highlighted in the red box are the areas responsive to touch. Other parts of the screen will not be responsive to any touch input.  
> **Image:** RAK10701-L home display  
> **TIP:** NOTE

> **TIP:** NOTE
The complete details on different pages of the screens are discussed in the [RAK10701-L Quick Start Guide](https://docs.rakwireless.com/product-categories/wisgate/rak10701-l/quickstart/).

title: RAK10701-P Field Tester for LoRaWAN Pro Datasheet > RAK10701-P Field Tester for LoRaWAN Pro Datasheet > Specifications > Hardware > Interfaces > External Button > RAK10701 External Button Functions [TABLE]
content:
There is one external button on RAK10701 which can be used in various scenarios.  
1. Turning on and off (holding for five seconds)
2. Forced uplink (double-click)
3. Sleep and wake-up (single click)  
> **Image:** RAK10701-L useable button

title: RAK10701-P Field Tester for LoRaWAN Pro Datasheet > RAK10701-P Field Tester for LoRaWAN Pro Datasheet > Specifications > Hardware > Interfaces > Antenna RP-SMA Connector > RAK10701-P Antenna Specifications and Details
content:
On top of the RAK10701-P Field Tester for LoRaWAN is an RP-SMA port for the external antenna.  
> **Image:** RAK10701-P RP-SMA antenna port  
There are two antennas included in the RAK10701-P, one with 2.0dBi gain:  
> **Image:** 2.0 dBi antenna  
Then, another one with 2.3dBi gain.  
> **Image:** 2.3 dBi antenna  
> **TIP:** NOTE
Detailed information about the LoRa antenna can be found on the datasheet:

- [8xx MHz Antenna](https://docs.rakwireless.com/product-categories/accessories/rakarj17/overview/)

title: RAK10701-P Field Tester for LoRaWAN Pro Datasheet > RAK10701-P Field Tester for LoRaWAN Pro Datasheet > Specifications > Hardware > Interfaces > USB Type-C for Charging and WisToolBox Configuration > RAK10701 Configuration Interfaces
content:
There is also a USB interface on RAK10701. You can use [WisToolBox](https://docs.rakwireless.com/product-categories/software-tools/wistoolbox/overview/) software to configure the devices via USB connection. You also have the option to configure the device wirelessly via BLE connection using the [WisToolBox Mobile App](https://docs.rakwireless.com/product-categories/software-tools/wistoolbox/wistoolbox-mobile/) compatible with iOS and Android.  
> **Image:** USB Type-C connector access

> **Image:** USB Type-C connector access

title: RAK10701-P Field Tester for LoRaWAN Pro Datasheet > RAK10701-P Field Tester for LoRaWAN Pro Datasheet > Specifications > Hardware > RF Characteristics > LoRaWAN Operating Frequencies > RAK10701-P Field Tester for LoRaWAN Regional Bands [TABLE]
content:
The RAK10701-L Field Tester for LoRaWAN supports the regional bands shown in the table below. When purchasing a RAK10701, pay attention to specifying the correct variant for your region.  
| Region        | Frequency (MHz) | RAK10701-P Field Tester for LoRaWAN |
| ------------- | --------------- | ----------------------------------- |
| Russia        | RU864           | 8xx MHz version                     |
| India         | IN865           | 8xx MHz version                     |
parent_content:
The RAK10701-L Field Tester for LoRaWAN supports the regional bands shown in the table below. When purchasing a RAK10701, pay attention to specifying the correct variant for your region.  
| Region        | Frequency (MHz) | RAK10701-P Field Tester for LoRaWAN |
| ------------- | --------------- | ----------------------------------- |
| Russia        | RU864           | 8xx MHz version                     |
| India         | IN865           | 8xx MHz version                     |
| Europe        | EU868           | 8xx MHz version                     |
| North America | US915           | 9xx MHz version                     |
| Canada        | US915           | 9xx MHz version                     |
| Australia     | AU915           | 9xx MHz version                     |
| Korea         | KR920           | 9xx MHz version                     |
| Asia          | AS923-1/2/3/4   | 9xx MHz version                     |
